reviews.text: Stayed here in early September 2004 for 1 night before departing out of Madrid.
reviews.title: Brand New - Great Hotel - Reasonble Price
Wonderful for business travel
reviews.text: Taxi found it hard to find when arriving to hotel, so this caused our taxi fare to go up! The only bad thing. I think the hotel is so new most taxis do not know where it is, and we do not know spanish so it was an interesting ride!
